name: Cashflow Supervision
passiveDesc: ATK is increased by 16/20/24/28/32%. When current HP increases or decreases, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by 16/20/24/28/32% and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by 14/17.5/21/24.5/28% for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the wielder has 3 stacks, ATK SPD will be increased by 8/10/12/14/16%.
